title: Update a Stowage Plan in Real-Time
description: During vessel loading, a container that was planned to be loaded is found to be damaged. The planner must update the stowage plan.

tasks.description: Receive a notification from operations that a specific container cannot be loaded.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner gets an alert that container XXXU1234567 is on hold.

tasks.description: Remove the held container from the active stowage plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The planner updates the plan to omit the held container.

tasks.description: Find a suitable replacement container from the yard and assign it to the now-empty slot on the vessel to maintain the planned weight and balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner finds a container of similar weight and destination and assigns it to the vessel slot, then re-sends the updated work sequence to the crane.
